text: John Walker Mitchell (1832 – 23 July 1914) was a Scottish-born New Zealand politician. He immigrated to New Zealand from Australia in 1862. He was a losing candidate in the 1871 Invercargill mayoral election and 1895 Invercargill mayoral election. He was twice mayor of Invercargill (1875–1876, 1889–1890) and served as Councillor for two terms (1873–1875, 1887–1889). == Sources == * * ==External Links== * Mr. John Walker Mitchell|NZETC * Brief History of Eastern Cemetery – past mayors ==Bibliography== *The Statutes of New Zealand, page 20. title: John Walker Mitchell
